dyad Dyad is a local, open-source AI app builder. It's fast, private, and fully under your control — like Lovable, v0, or Bolt, but running right on your machine. !Imagehttp://dyad.sh/ More info at: http://dyad.sh/ 🚀 Features - ⚡️ Local: Fast, private and no lock-in. - 🛠 Bring your own keys: Use your own AI API keys — no vendor lock-in. - 🖥️ Cross-platform: Easy to run on Mac or Windows. 📦 Download No sign-up required. Just download and go. 👉 Download for your platform Dyad is open-source Apache 2.0 licensed. If you're interested in contributing to dyad, please read our contributing doc.
